objection_patterns.name: CapRateTooLow
response_playbook: Acknowledge: You're right to flag cap rate - that's the key metric
Reframe: Consider DSCR and rent growth in this corridor - the fundamentals are strong
Offer: I have two comps with better NOI; let me share the underwriting sheet

objection_patterns.name: VacancyRisk
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Vacancy is a real consideration for any rental property
Reframe: This area has 94% occupancy rate and average tenant stays 3+ years
Offer: Let me show you the rental demand data and comparable vacancy rates

objection_patterns.name: HighHOA
response_playbook: Acknowledge: I understand - HOA fees directly impact your bottom line
Reframe: These fees cover water, exterior maintenance, and amenities that attract higher-paying tenants
Offer: Let me show you the rent premium units in this complex command vs. no-HOA properties

objection_patterns.name: AppraisalGap
response_playbook: Acknowledge: Appraisal protection is smart - you want to ensure you're not overpaying
Reframe: I can show you how to cover an appraisal gap with 25 cents on the dollar out of pocket
Offer: Let me explain the financing strategy my investor clients use

knowledge_snippets: Quick DSCR explainer: Debt Service Coverage Ratio - lenders want to see 1.25 or higher, meaning property generates 25% more income than debt payment
Cap rate vs cash-on-cash return: Cap rate is NOI/purchase price, CoC return accounts for financing
Rent growth map notes for 802xx zips: Average 4.2% annual increase last 3 years
